Articles.Content:
Well I'm not sure this is the right place for this thread, but here goes.

I am one of the few that has the dreaded C R A S H issue, yet in vanilla mode it works ok. So I have decided to run it in vanilla, and add my mods one at a time until the crash surfaces.

right now I have managed to get .24 to run vanilla, that proves the base model is good, now I have added the fasa pack, and so far so good.

Everything seems to be running fine.

Im conveinced it's something someone created and may not know about it. Will keep ya all posted.

SYSTEM INFO

Pentium Dual Core 3.20 with 4 gig on board, 2 gig video NVIDIA 210

Windows XP X64 sp2

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM/KSCSM 8th BMTS Sulaco.
If you get a crash in a modded install, please follow the guideline in the sticky. It'll make it much easier to diagnose.
Well update, I found it, sadly KSO is causing the crash. I even installed the space x and no crash.
